particle_framework module¶

Programming for Social Science - Assignment 2. Bactrial Particle Class and code to execute.

Created on Mon Oct 12 15:26:42 2020 @author: Shivani Sickotra

class particle_framework.Particle(town, particles, y, x)¶

Bases: object

Particle Class:

A class to give attributes and behaviours to an abstract particle.

Constructor arguements:

town – 2D list containing the area particles will be in. particles – a list of all the particles in the town. y – y coord before init method sets particles’ coods. x – x coord before init method sets particles’ coods.

Particle characteristics:

  • height

  • y coordinate

  • x coordinate

Particle behaviours:

  • spread

  • turbulance

get_height()¶

Divert access of height int variable to a hidden int variable.

get_x()¶

Divert access of x int variable to a hidden int variable.

get_y()¶

Divert access of y int variable to a hidden int variable.

property height¶

Divert access of height int variable to a hidden int variable.

set_height(value)¶

Divert mutation of height int variable to a hidden int variable.

set_x(value)¶

Divert mutation of x int variable to a hidden int variable.

set_y(value)¶

Divert mutation of y int variable to a hidden int variable.

spread(p_east, p_west, p_north, p_south)¶

Random walk particles 1 step in one of four directions, depending on direction probabilities assigned by user.

p_eastint.

Variable for percentage probability of particle moving east.

p_westint.

Variable for percentage probability of particle moving west.

p_northint.

Variable for percentage probability of particle moving north.

p_southint.

Variable for percentage probability of particle moving south.

None.

turbulance(p_rise, p_same, p_fall)¶

Random walk particles 1 step either up or down, depending on turbulance probabilities assigned by user, until all particles reach the ground.

p_riseint.

Variable for percentage probability of particle rising upwards.

p_sameint.

Variable for percentage probability of particle remaining at the same level.

p_fallint.

Variable for percentage probability of particle falling downwards.

None.

property x¶

Divert access of x int variable to a hidden int variable.

property y¶

Divert access of y int variable to a hidden int variable.

Bacterial Bomb
